nodes.text: Star Wars: Reader Collection is a young-readers compilation book that collects three previously published stories in the World of Reading series: Finn & the First Order, A Leader Named Leia, and Rey's Journey. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press in September 2019 and was available exclusively through retailer Target.
Explore the galaxy with heroes and villains in this reader collection! Level 2 readers feature simple story lines, compound sentences, and contractions. This bindup includes:
